content: KWIK-CON II+ Torx hex head screw anchor Versatile, high-performance screw anchor for concrete and masonry (carbon steel, hex head with Torx®) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier and quicker installation with just one tool Torx® hex head with integrated washer for more secure driving and no bit slippage Durable design minimizes risk of head snaps Also available in stainless steel or with Torx® or Phillips flat head for countersinking applications Matched-tolerance carbide-tipped drill bits required when installing these screw anchors Applications Fastening in concrete, block, brick, masonry and some types of stone Window and door frames Installing electrical wall fixtures Installing hand rails ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Head configuration: Hex head Drill bit diameter: 0.2 in Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Head configuration | Hex head | Approvals / Test reports | Miami Dade County | Base materials | Concrete (uncracked), Masonry (grout-filled CMU), Masonry (solid) | Type of fixing | Through-fastening | Reusable (and removable) | Not Possible | Cleaning procedures | Manual Cleaning | PROFIS Software | No | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor | Installation direction | All | Material composition | Steel, zinc-plated (min. 5 µm) ### ITEMS- 433034 - Screw anc KC II+ 3/16 x 3-3/4 THH - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x Kwik-Con II+ 3/16x3 3/4 THH Screw anchor - 3477574 - Screw anc KC II+ 3/16 x 3-3/4 THH MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1000x Kwik-Con II+ 3/16x3 3/4 THH Screw anchor
